text: Aur tum dekhoge ke yeh jahannum ke saamne jab laye jayenge to zillat ke maare jhuke jaa rahey hongey aur usko nazar bacha bacha kar kan aankiyon (covert glance) se dekhenge.Us waqt woh log jo iman laye thay kahenge ke waqai asal ziyan kaar ([true] losers) wahi hain jinhon ne aaj qayamat ke din apne aapko aur apne mutaaliqin ko khasare mein daal diya. Khabardar raho, zaalim log mustaqil azaab mein hongey
